sentences.english: Phenomenon of estuarine turbidity maximum zone is modeled by 2-dimensional numerical model.

sentences.english: The answer was to block certain estuaries leading to Antwerp and Rotterdam

sentences.english: Many boats have run aground on the sandbar at the river mouth.

sentences.english: Dredging is only a temporary solution to this problem.

sentences.english: Its muddy water makes the ocean brown for 200 miles.

sentences.english: Soon we had left the river estuary and were heading towards the open sea.
